description.narrative: The objective of the Da Nang Priority Infrastructure Investment Project is to improve the efficiency, effectiveness and sustainability of urban services under the control of Da Nang city through a package of priority investments including urban upgrading, environmental improvement and strategic road access, as well as measures for institutional strengthening for management of urban services. There are four components to the project. The first component of the project is urban area upgrading. This component will fund: (a) tertiary infrastructure (community level) upgrading and service improvements in 14 low income areas; (b) construction of three resettlement sites; and (c) micro-finance for housing improvement. The second component of the project is environment infrastructure improvement. This component will finance: (a) drainage linking to the tertiary systems of all 14 low income areas; (b) improvement to primary and secondary drainage systems; (c) Phu LOC river environmental improvement; and (d) improvement and extension of primary wastewater systems. The third component of the project is urban roads and bridges. This component will support the construction of two major road links for improving access to the fast growing new district of Cam Le: (a) city center to Southern area; and (b) Southern Da Nang link road section. The fourth and the final component of the project is capacity building and project implementation support. This component will provide technical assistance and training to enhance the capacity of Da Nang City's departments to carry out their responsibilities in: (a) housing and land management; (b) urban development management; (c) urban technical infrastructure management; (d) municipal finance management; and (e) to support the Project Management Unit (PMU) in project implementation.

title.narrative: New plots developed annually in Southern Development Areas

comment.narrative: The actual achievement exceeded the target of 1,500 for 2012.

title.narrative: Percentage of households in project LIAs satisfied with quality of urban services provided under the project

comment.narrative: The actual achievement exceeded the target of 60% for 2012.

title.narrative: Reduced congestion in strategic corridors:- New DSR (CPU)

comment.narrative: The construction of this road is dropped from this project and will be implemented in a new SCDP project.

title.narrative: Reduced congestion in strategic corridors:- New NTP (CPU)

comment.narrative: The part of construction of this road which could not be completed by the original closing date June 30, 2013 will be continuedunder the project SCDP

title.narrative: Average land values in project LIAs (VND millions/m2)

comment.narrative: The actual achievement met the target of 7 VND million for 2012.

title.narrative: Number of LUCs issued per annum (sheet/year)

comment.narrative: The actual achievement exceeded the target of 10,000 sheets for 2012.

title.narrative: Reduced congestion in strategic corridors:Reduced congestion in strategic corridors:- Existing Tran Dai Nghia (CPU)

comment.narrative: The actual traffic is lower than the target of 21,370 CPU for 2012. The Reason is that the city built more roads in the area fromthe city budget which helped diverting traffic from the on the key roads which were agreed at project appraisal to monitor dailytraffic.

title.narrative: Level of water pollution as measured by level of BOD in Phu Loc River outlet (mg/l)

comment.narrative: After the wastewater collection pipe along two sides of Phu Loc river completed (package B16), the water quality of Phu Loc riverwas very much improved.

title.narrative: Proportion of HH in the city affected by flooding (%)

comment.narrative: The actual achievement is close to the target of 20% for 2012.

title.narrative: Percentage of cost recovery for wastewater services (%) (cost for proposed order is 30 billion dong, real revenue of wastewater through water supply bill is 8.565 billion dong)

comment.narrative: The actual achievement exceeded the target of 93% for 2012.

title.narrative: Percentage of times per total measurements per year of wastewater treatment performance exceeding effluent standards for BOD and SS(%)

comment.narrative: The actual measurement is taken for existing Phu Loc WWTP which is already operating at its capacity for which a planned new LienChieu WWTP will help resolve this problem.

title.narrative: Percentage of HH in project LIAs with drainage / wastewater connections (%)

comment.narrative: The actual achievement exceeded the target of 68% for 2012.

title.narrative: Actual payments made by households for wastewater services received (VND milion)

comment.narrative: The actual achievement exceeded the target of 18,000 VND million for 2012

title.narrative: Percentage of HH in project LIAs that have piped water supply on plot (%)

comment.narrative: The actual achievement exceeded the target of 75% for 2012.

comment.narrative: The actual achievement exceed the target of 6,210 CPU for 2012.

comment.narrative: The actual achievement exceeded the target of 10,089 VND billion for 2012.

title.narrative: Percent of operating costs of micro-credit recovered though fees and interest (%)

comment.narrative: The actual achievement met the target of 100% for 2012.
Nguyenthiphuong road has been significantly completed as of December 2012, and will be fully completed about 2 months ahead of theoriginal schedule
The actual achievement met the target of 350,000 people for 2012.
